titles.title: For the relief of Major Ralph Edwards.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 6/13/1995--Introduced. Deems a named individual, for purposes of computing retired pay, to have held the grade of lieutenant colonel on the date of his retirement from the United States Air Force and provides for a lump sum payment of amounts owed on such basis.
